objects.specification: An enclosed classroom space defined by four vertical walls, a ceiling, and a floor, painted in neutral light colors with smooth matte finish, designed to create a bright and welcoming indoor environment.
A flat floor surface with a neutral light grey tone and subtle texture that resembles vinyl or laminate flooring, providing a durable and even base for the classroom.
A smooth vertical wall panel with a neutral light-colored paint finish and minimal trim, suitable for mounting classroom fixtures.
A smooth vertical wall panel with a neutral light-colored paint finish and minimal trim, suitable for mounting classroom fixtures.
A smooth vertical wall panel with a neutral light-colored paint finish and minimal trim, suitable for mounting classroom fixtures.
A smooth vertical wall panel with a neutral light-colored paint finish and minimal trim, suitable for mounting classroom fixtures.
A simple interior door with a light neutral-colored painted surface, rectangular panel design, minimalistic metal handle, installed flush within the wall opening.
A larger rectangular teacher desk with rich dark wood tone finish and visible wood grain, smooth lacquered surface, sturdy metal legs, and an integrated modesty panel.
A classic teacher chair featuring a cushioned seat and back upholstered in neutral grey fabric, supported by a metal frame with four legs, offering comfortable seating.
A large rectangular whiteboard with a glossy white melamine surface and a slim silver aluminum frame, designed for clear marker writing and easy cleaning.
A compact ceiling-mounted projector with white plastic housing and discreet air vents, featuring a minimalist design suitable for classroom use.
A tall open bookshelf unit with multiple adjustable shelves in light wood veneer finish, stocked with a variety of colorful books and decorative items.
A tall open bookshelf unit with multiple adjustable shelves in light wood veneer finish, stocked with a variety of colorful books and decorative items.
A tall open bookshelf unit with multiple adjustable shelves in light wood veneer finish, stocked with a variety of colorful books and decorative items.
A large rectangular window with clear glass panes framed by slim metal profiles and equipped with adjustable horizontal blinds in a soft cream color.
A round wall clock with a white face, clear black numerals, slender black hour and minute hands, and a thin black metal frame.
A circular area rug in a soft beige tone with a subtle braided texture, medium pile, adding a cozy touch to the classroom center.
A decorative indoor potted plant featuring lush green foliage in a simple ceramic planter, adding a natural aesthetic to the space.
A decorative indoor potted plant featuring lush green foliage in a simple ceramic planter, adding a natural aesthetic to the space.
A cylindrical waste bin in medium grey plastic with a matte finish, durable and easy to clean.
A cylindrical waste bin in medium grey plastic with a matte finish, durable and easy to clean.
A student desk with a rectangular tabletop in a light wood tone finish, supported by slender metal legs, featuring a smooth laminated surface and rounded corners for safety.
A student chair with a molded seat and backrest in a matching light wood finish, supported by a metal frame, designed for comfort and durability.
